original_text: But the woman fearing and trembling, knowing what was done in her, came and fell down before him, and told him all the truth.
korean_text: 여자가 자기에게 이루어진 일을 알고 두려워하여 떨며 와서 그 앞에 엎드려 모든 사실을 여쭈니

sentences.original_text: But the woman was fearing and trembling
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 여자는 두려워하며 떨고 있었다

sentences.original_text: knowing what was done in her
came and fell down before him
and told him all the truth
